website_summaries.verdict: For $60, the ST Activate from the Puma sneaker line offers a neat and stylish appeal, perfect for everyday styling. It's also comfortable, lightweight, and well-cushioned. The mesh material delivers a very ventilated feel, ideal for more prolonged wearing during warm weather.Wearers can choose among several color options to suit their personal style. Although the sneaker has an excellent fit, a few testers with wide feet have found the width to be rather tight.
pros: The Puma ST Activate is a budget-friendly shoe, with a few users commenting that it has a very good price
It’s good-looking, neat, and stylish, a lot of buyers have praised
Several color options are available for the sneaker
According to many testers, the Puma ST Activate is very comfortable and is perfect for wearing all day
It’s very lightweight, more than a handful of wearers have remarked
According to several commenters, the shoe has a perfect fit
A few commenters note that the Puma ST Activate’s mesh material offers a very breathable feel
The sneaker has soft inserts, and excellent cushioning, a couple of users have lauded
One buyer like the shoe so much that he bought a second pair
cons: A few wide-footed testers have observed that the Puma ST Activate has a tight fit

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes under $40
customer_reviews.text: The sole is hard. Shoes look much better in person. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Q

customer_reviews.title: Are you serious?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what all the rave reviews are all about unless you wear these sitting down all day. Why not just get flip flops? I have been wearing these for exactly a half hour and I can already feel the knobs on the bottom of my feet. Can you imagine if it rains? I can't believe I actually just wasted $45 on these but unfortunately I'm stuck with them now because the sneaker I wanted is no longer in stock and desperately need these for work... Terrible
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and casual
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip on and off as a pair of casual sneakers. Like the color and feel. They feel sort of thin and I have a bit of concern that they won't hold up over time. Will see how they hold up and review again in time.
customer_reviews.author: David P Shick

customer_reviews.title: Quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes when it comes to comfort and style...but one the shoes the Puma strip is not sewn properly and is loose and will fall off if I dont glue or restitch
customer_reviews.author: goldenarm

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I don't think these can be beat. They look great, are comfortable, and still stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I liked them so much I bought a second pair. Super comfortable. Very lightweight. I wear these at work and they help reduce the shock to my ankles and shins from the concrete floors. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is here.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable pair of sneakers for work. I'm on my feet majority of the day, a lot of walking and standing. These sneakers are beyond comfortable. I'll probably end up buying two more pairs in different colors. They look even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, comfortable, & quality shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well (size 11). The feel is very comfortable and lite. Perfect for anyone who walks a lot, and on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a Puma guy for a few years now. Overall, an excellent value, style and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were amazingly lightweight., attractive, and reasonably priced. My brother lived them.
customer_reviews.author: kandi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for everyday wear. I have also used them to run in (a little over 8 miles) within a few days and my feet/knees were good. The tread wear out fairly quick but the comfort stayed. Can’t beat it for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: After only wearing them 4 times, the 1st eyelet came out (broke). Now they are trash!!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good cushion and very breathable
customer_reviews.text: Good cushion and very breathable which is super important for a vet tech (animal nurse) that is on her feet 10-12hrs a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puma
customer_reviews.text: Puma has never failed me! These sneakers are comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Cari Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the Puma ST Activates....super comfortable with the perfect true to size fit!
customer_reviews.author: kbrizzle

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe too big though I ordered an 8.5 it fits more like a 9.5. Good shoe for price
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Dede

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! I usually wear Nike and never owned a pair of Pumas but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PUMA Unisex Adults’ St Activate Sneaker
product_meta.description: This fresh style is all about lightweight comfort! A very sleek and breathable air mesh upper is combined with a lightweight injected mold eva unisole. You will see it feels like minimal weight on your feet! The SoftFoam+ sockliner provides superior cushioning and optimal comfort for every step of your day.
